ext_description.p: A Physical_component_feature is a type of . The Physical_component_feature supports identification of physical features that are not otherwise identified in a component feature classification. Physical_component_feature is only applicable to physical assembly design views and is not applicable to interconnect design views.
ext_description.note: The Physical_component_feature is interpreted to be an aim entity when no other information is provided in the aim population.
The Physical_component_feature is not supporting embedded discrete components since the context of components in the implicit role of embedded discrete component is an interconnect view.

The Physical_component_feature supports the specification of a
as a
or the specification that a
defines a
for the purpose of estabishing a datum reference frame for tolerance specification.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Physical_component_terminal is a type of and a .
the text that provides further information about terminal type for the Physical_component_terminal. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
